item.description:
Without your help, the Peace Abbey may become just a memory.

Please friends attend the
Nov 12th, 2011 - 2PM-6PM
ChickenPeace Educational Benefit
at the Peace Abbey
2 North Main Street
Sherborn, MA 01770

Included will be:

A Brief History of the Peace Abbey
A Fundraiser (generosity is a virtue!)
A ChickenPeace Presentation
A free small meal from Belmont Veg
A "Pay as you eat" dessert bar
A Tour of the Peace Abbey
Announcements, and
A Prayer for the Vitality of the Peace Abbey and for all that it stands.

Additional information may be obtained by emailing baerwolf@hotmail.com or by calling Steve at 508.842.1450

About the Peace Abbey's mission for peace, vegetarian cruelty-free living, and so on: http://www.peaceabbey.org/about/

 

This is an unofficial meetup, meaning we won't be meeting as a group specifically, just inviting all to attend with friends and family.
item.name: Peace Abbey ChickenPeace Educational Benefit
